trans-unit.source: Animates from the <xref:System.Single> value of the previous key frame to its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value*> using linear interpolation.
trans-unit.target: Animates do <xref:System.Single>valor da moldura chave anterior para as suas próprias <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value*>utilizando linear interpolação.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value*> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Single> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é utilizada como parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrameCollection>em conjunto com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames>para animar uma <xref:System.Single>valor da propriedade ao longo de um conjunto de chaves fotogramas.</xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: Uma fotograma chave define um segmento do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames>a que pertence.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleAnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cada fotograma chave tem um destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>Especifica o tempo no qual a fotograma chave <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value%2A>deve ser atingido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SingleKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: Uma fotograma chave animates do valor de destino da moldura chave anterior para o seu próprio valor de destino.

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: Começa quando a fotograma chave anterior termina e termina quando for atingido o seu próprio tempo chave.

trans-unit.source: Linear key frames like LinearSingleKeyFrame create a smooth, linear interpolation between values.
trans-unit.target: Lineares frames chaves como LinearSingleKeyFrame criar uma interpolação uniforme, linear entre valores.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com o valor final especificado.

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: A terminar o valor (também conhecido como "destino o valor") para a fotograma chave.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com a hora do valor e chave de fim especificada.

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: A terminar o valor (também conhecido como "destino o valor") para a fotograma chave.

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Tempo chave para o fotograma chave.

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: O tempo chave determina quando for atingido o valor de destino que também é quando a fotograma chave termina.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearSingleKeyFrame"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, in a linear fashion, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: Interpolates, de forma linear, entre o valor de fotograma chave anterior e o valor da moldura chave atual, utilizando o incremento de progresso fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: O valor para animar do.

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0,0 e 1,0, inclusive, que especifica a percentagem de tempo decorrido para este frame chave.

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: O valor de saída deste fotograma chave indicado o valor base especificado e o progresso.
